hits.definition:
洲

[zhōu] continent; 亚洲 Yàzhōu Asia; 欧洲 ōuzhōu Europe; 非洲 Fēizhōu Africa

松

[sōng] pine tree; 松鼠 squirrel, (F 鬆) loose

坏

[huài] (F 壞) bad

[pī] (=坯)

邓 (F 鄧)

[Dèng] <family name>

鲜 (F 鮮)

[xiān] fresh

[xiǎn] few, rare; 朝鲜 Korea

短

[duǎn] short (opposite of 长 cháng)

毕 (F 畢)

[bì] 毕业 bìyè graduate; 毕竟 bìjìng after all

置

[zhì] put, place; 位置 wèizhi position

楚

[chu] 清楚 qīngchu clear

[chǔ] 苦楚 kǔchǔ misery

欧 (F 歐)

[ōu] 欧洲 ōuzhōu Europe; 欧姆 ōumǔ ohm

略

[lüè] brief, slight; 略微 lüèwēi slightly

智

[zhì] 智慧 zhìhuì wisdom; 智力 zhìlì intellegence

岛 (F 島)

[dǎo] island

抗

[kàng] (=抵抗 dǐkàng) resist; 反抗 revolt; 抗议 protest

妻

[qī] (=妻子 qīzi) wife

抱

[bào] hug, embrace

载 (F 載)

[zài] carry, be loaded with

[zǎi] 记载 put down in writing

败 (F 敗)

[bài] (失败 shībài) lose, be defeated; 腐败 fǔbài corrupt

枪 (F 槍)

[qiāng] gun

[chēng] 欃枪 chánchēng comet

适 (F 適)

[shì] 合适 héshì suitable, appropriate

[dí] 适从 dícóng follow, go to
